description: Also known as the Great General 大将軍 dai shogun, the ruling Shogunate of Edo in Gintama world. Older brother of http://anidb.net/ch16867 [Sayo Hime]. In Episode 83 he was seen by Yorozuya at http://anidb.net/ch16984 [Snack Smile] club to have very small male genitalia. He seems to have terrible luck as regardless of the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] attempts to help him enjoy himself, he was constantly put in more and more humiliating positions thanks to their game.
name: Tokugawa Shigeshige
